biotools.summary: NITPicker (Next Iteration Time-point Picker) selects optimal time points (or spatial points along a single axis), that eliminates some of the biases caused by human decision-making, while maximising information about the shape of the underlying curves.

bioschemas.name: NITPicker
bioschemas.summary: NITPicker (Next Iteration Time-point Picker) selects optimal time points (or spatial points along a single axis), that eliminates some of the biases caused by human decision-making, while maximising information about the shape of the underlying curves.
